caption.p: Dominant climate factor (significant) responsible for explaining crop yield variability in ( a) Maize; ( b) Irrigated maize; ( c) Non-irrigated maize; ( d) Sorghum; ( e) Irrigated sorghum; ( f) Non-irrigated sorghum; ( g) Soybean; ( h) Irrigated soybean; ( i) Non-irrigated soybean yields in the Great Plains counties over the period 1968â€“2013. Four outcomes including temperature only, precipitation only, both temperature and precipitation, and NA are possible. NA indicates that no climate factor was able to explain crop yield variability at 90% confidence level. We created the maps using ESRI ArcMap 10.4.1 software http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/.
